w :  come to the movies with us .  everybody needs to take a break every once in a while .
m :  i guess i might as well .  i ' ve been studying so long i just can ' t concentrate .

question: why can ' t the man concentrate on his study ?
choice: he keeps thinking of going to the movies .
his classmates are taking a break .
he ' s been studying for too long .
answer: he ' s been studying for too long .
